Structs/JobContext.html.name: JobContext
Structs/JobContext.html.abstract: A simple wrapper to hold job context and services.

Structs/JobStorage.html.name: JobStorage
Structs/JobStorage.html.abstract: Holds information about the Job that is to be encoded to the persistence store.

Structs/JobsProvider.html.abstract: A provider used to setup the Jobs package

Structs/QueueName.html.name: QueueName

Protocols/JobsPersistenceLayer.html#/s:4.abstract: The event loop to be run on

Protocols/JobsPersistenceLayer.html#/s:4.name: get(key:)
Protocols/JobsPersistenceLayer.html#/s:4.abstract: Returns a JobData wrapper for a specified key.

Protocols/JobsPersistenceLayer.html#/s:4.name: set(key:jobStorage:)
Protocols/JobsPersistenceLayer.html#/s:4.abstract: Handles adding a Job to the persistence layer for future processing.

Protocols/Job.html#/s:4Jobs3JobP5errory3.abstract: Called when there is an error at any stage of the Job’s execution.

Protocols/Job.html.name: Job
Protocols/Job.html.abstract: A task that can be queued for future execution.

Protocols/JobData.html.abstract: Context that can be stored with a Job

Protocols/JobsPersistenceLayer.html.abstract: A type that can store and retrieve jobs from a persistence layer
